plot: The bond between two boys in 1980s West Yorkshire, pushed by the need to create something beautiful in their down-trodden world.
title: Trailing Dirt
plot_es: The bond between two boys in 1980s West Yorkshire, pushed by the need to create something beautiful in their down-trodden world.
plot_en: The bond between two boys in 1980s West Yorkshire, pushed by the need to create something beautiful in their down-trodden world.
